text: @Mike_Pence @WhiteHouse Dear Mr Mike Pence, did you think that been progressive in testing people globally in order to confirm if they have covid-19 and to supply them medically for cure worth a celebration inasmuch the World Health Organization failed to tell us either this pandemic disease....
